article_title: Employee stock purchase programs may increase worker confidence
article_text:
Photo: AP

Employees who participate in their company’s employee stock purchase program may have more confidence and control over their financial well-being.

That’s according to Fidelity Investments research that looked at the behaviors of some 300,000 employees over a two-year period.

article_metadata.description: Employees who participate in their company’s employee stock purchase program may have more confidence and control over their financial well-being, a study from Fidelity shows.
